```{r}
library(devtools)

require(GenomicSEM)
```


##Munge

```{r}
setwd('~/Desktop/gsemProj/')
munge(files=c('./opi.DEPvEXP_trans.ancestry.noAF.tbl','./pts_eur_freeze2_overall.results'),
      hm3='./w_hm3.noMHC.snplist', trait.names = c("sud","ptsd"))
```


##Cov matrix

```{r}
traits <- c("sud.sumstats.gz", "ptsd.sumstats.gz", "mdd.sumstats", "biploar.sumstats")
sample.prev <- c(.51,.15, #mdd, #bipl)
population.prev <- c(.23,.08,.16,.01)
ld <- "eur_w_ld_chr/"
wld <- "eur_w_ld_chr/"
trait.names<-c("SUD","PTSD","MDD","BIPL")
LDSCoutput <- ldsc(traits, sample.prev, population.prev, ld, wld, trait.names)
```
